# `r targets$glds` Load Raw Data Notebook
#### `r Sys.Date()`
#### Organism: `r targets$organism`
#### Platform: `r targets$platform` Microarray

## Raw Files Listing
```{r raw-files-listing}
print(targets$filetype)
print(targets$raw_files)
```

## Mapping Appropriate Loading Protocol
``` {r flag-setting}
channel_1_txt_flag <- ((targets$filetype %in% c("TXT","RAW.TXT")) & (targets$channels == 1))
channel_2_txt_flag <- ((targets$filetype %in% c("TXT","RAW.TXT")) & (targets$channels == 2))
channel_1_gpr_flag <- ((targets$filetype %in% c("GPR")) & (targets$channels == 1))
channel_2_gpr_flag <- ((targets$filetype %in% c("GPR")) & (targets$channels == 2))
channel_1_cel_flag <- ((targets$filetype %in% c("CEL")) & (targets$channels == 1)) # note, cel format should always be single channel so the channels check is redudant

supported_flags <- sum(
channel_1_txt_flag, 
channel_2_txt_flag, 
channel_1_gpr_flag, 
channel_2_gpr_flag, 
channel_1_cel_flag 
)

if (supported_flags != 1) { 
    stop(sprintf("Error: One and only one flag condition should be met. Flag conditions met: %d,  see flag conditions in this markdown file", supported_flags))
}
```

## Raw File Loading
```{r raw-file-loading-1-channel-txt, eval=(channel_1_txt_flag), include=(channel_1_txt_flag)}
raw_data <- read.maimages(basename(targets$raw_files), 
		          source="agilent", 
		          green.only=TRUE, 
		     	  names = targets$t1$SampleName)
```

```{r raw-file-loading-1-channel-gpr, eval=(channel_1_gpr_flag), include=(channel_1_gpr_flag)}
raw_data <- read.maimages(basename(targets$raw_files), 
		          source="genepix", 
		          wt.fun=wtflags(weight=0,cutoff=-50), 
		          green.only=TRUE, 
		          names = targets$t1$SampleName)
```

```{r raw-file-loading-2-channel-gpr, eval=(channel_2_gpr_flag), include=(channel_2_gpr_flag)}
files <- unique(basename(targets$raw_files))
raw_data <- read.maimages(files,
		          source="genepix", 
		          wt.fun=wtflags(weight=0,cutoff=-50))
```

```{r raw-file-loading-2-channel-txt, eval=(channel_2_txt_flag), include=(channel_2_txt_flag)}
files <- unique(basename(targets$raw_files))
raw_data <- read.maimages(files, 
		          source="agilent")
```

```{r raw-file-loading-1-channel-cel, eval=(channel_1_cel_flag), include=(channel_1_cel_flag)}
raw_data <- oligo::read.celfiles(targets$raw_files)
```

## Status
```{r status, echo=FALSE}
sprintf("Raw files successfully loaded as class %s. Saving 'raw' to Rdata file", class(raw_data))
save(raw_data, file="raw_data.Rdata")
```
